posts.post_title: FS: (2) T206 portraits Evers and Chase Pink
posts.post_content:
I have two portraits available for sale.  I'm looking to get $200 for the Evers and $55 for the Chase, Pink Background.  All payment methods are accepted, but will be happier with a check or money order.

Thanks,
Mark Foytack
